Module roborally
Package game.round

Class ProgrammingPhase

java.lang.Object
game.round.Phase
game.round.ProgrammingPhase
public class ProgrammingPhase
extends Phase
In this class the players put down their programming cards for the five registers.
Author:
janau, sarah

  • Field Details

    • logger

      private static final org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger

    • gameTimer

      private final GameTimer gameTimer

    • notReadyPlayers

      private final java.util.ArrayList<Player> notReadyPlayers
      saves the player ID's. A player gets removed if he has already chosen 5 cards before the timer runs out

    • timerFinished

      private boolean timerFinished

  • Constructor Details

    • ProgrammingPhase

      public ProgrammingPhase()
      starts the ProgrammingPhase. All Players get added to notReadyPlayers to track who has/hasn't finished programming If the register ist filled with cards from the previous round those get discarded. After that new cards are dealt.

  • Method Details

    • convertCardType

      public Card convertCardType​(CardType type)

    • putCardToRegister

      public void putCardToRegister​(Card chosenCard, Player player, int register)

    • removeCardFromRegister

      public void removeCardFromRegister​(Player player, int register)

    • handleCardSelection

      public void handleCardSelection​(Player player, SelectCard selectCard)
      If a player puts a card (or removes one) into a register it is saved there. If the player has filled all 5 registers and he is the first one to do so the timer is started.
      Parameters:
      player - The player moved a card in the register
      selectCard - Message that was received

    • startProgrammingTimer

      private void startProgrammingTimer()
      Starts a 30 second timer when the first player filled all 5 registers.

    • endProgrammingTimer

      public void endProgrammingTimer()
      Ends the timer. Either if 30sec ran through or if all players finished their selection. If some players still haven't filled their registers the dealRandomCard() method is called.

    • dealRandomCards

      private void dealRandomCards()
      For every player that didn't manage to put down their cards in time all cards on their hand and registers get discarded. They draw 5 programming cards and put them on their registers in random order

    • fillRegisters

      private void fillRegisters​(Player player)
      This methods fills the players register with 5 cards in random order Also it makes sure that there is no Again card in the first register
      Parameters:
      player - who needs to fill his registers

    • drawProgrammingCards

      private void drawProgrammingCards​(int amount, Player player)
      this method draws a given number of cards from the drawPile and adds it to the discarded Pile. if the draw pile doesn't provide enough cards the discarded Pile is shuffled and used to draw remaining cards.
      Parameters:
      amount - of cards to draw
      player - player that needs to draw cards

    • getNotReadyPlayers

      public java.util.ArrayList<Player> getNotReadyPlayers()
